testInfo.name: Тест по герундию и инфинитиву английского языка
testInfo.description: Тест на Gerund vs Infinitive после глаголов

questions.question: Choose the correct form: I enjoy ___ books.
Which verb is followed by infinitive?
Fill in the blank: She promised ___ (help) me.
Choose the correct form: He stopped ___ when he saw me.
Fill in the blank: I need ___ (buy) some milk.
Which verb can be followed by both gerund and infinitive?
Fill in the blank: She avoids ___ (meet) him.
Choose the correct form: I forgot ___ the door.
Fill in the blank: They decided ___ (go) to the cinema.
Which verb is always followed by gerund?
Fill in the blank: He finished ___ (write) the report.
Choose the correct sentence:
options: I like to swim in the sea.
I like swimming in the sea.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: We hope ___ (see) you soon.
What is the difference: 'I remember locking the door' vs 'I remembered to lock the door'?
options: First: past action, second: future action
First: action done, second: action to do
questions.correctAnswer: First: action done, second: action to do

questions.question: Fill in the blank: She suggested ___ (go) for a walk.
